    Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.kryo that implement SerializationSession
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KryoSerializationSession
    An extension of the Kryo object which adds enhanced reading and writing capabilities and enforces versioning of all data that is read or written, according to the SerializationSession contract.
